verses.kjv: My heart is inditing a good matter: I speak of the things which I have made touching the king: my tongue is the pen of a ready writer.
verses.ct: My heart overflows with a beautiful theme; I am composing this about the king. My tongue is like the pen of a skilled writer.

verses.kjv: Thou art fairer than the children of men: grace is poured into thy lips: therefore God hath blessed thee for ever.
verses.ct: You are more handsome than anyone else. Grace flows from your lips, and that is why God has blessed you forever.

verses.kjv: Gird thy sword upon thy thigh, O most mighty, with thy glory and thy majesty.
verses.ct: Strap your sword to your side, mighty warrior, along with your glory and your majesty.

verses.kjv: And in thy majesty ride prosperously because of truth and meekness and righteousness; and thy right hand shall teach thee terrible things.
verses.ct: In your majesty, ride out victoriously for the cause of truth, humility, and righteousness; your strong hand will accomplish awe-inspiring deeds.

verses.kjv: Thine arrows are sharp in the heart of the king’s enemies; whereby the people fall under thee.
verses.ct: Your arrows are sharp, piercing the hearts of the king's enemies; nations collapse beneath you.

verses.kjv: Thy throne, O God, is for ever and ever: the sceptre of thy kingdom is a right sceptre.
verses.ct: Your throne, O God, lasts forever and ever; the scepter of your kingdom is a scepter of justice.

verses.kjv: Thou lovest righteousness, and hatest wickedness: therefore God, thy God, hath anointed thee with the oil of gladness above thy fellows.
verses.ct: You love righteousness and hate evil. That is why God, your God, has anointed you with the oil of joy, setting you above your companions.

verses.kjv: All thy garments smell of myrrh, and aloes, and cassia, out of the ivory palaces, whereby they have made thee glad.
verses.ct: All your robes are fragrant with myrrh, aloes, and cassia. From ivory palaces, music fills you with delight.

verses.kjv: Kings’ daughters were among thy honourable women: upon thy right hand did stand the queen in gold of Ophir.
verses.ct: Daughters of kings are among your honored women. At your right side stands the queen, adorned in gold from Ophir.

verses.kjv: Hearken, O daughter, and consider, and incline thine ear; forget also thine own people, and thy father’s house;
verses.ct: Listen carefully, daughter, and pay close attention: leave behind your own people and your father's household.

verses.kjv: So shall the king greatly desire thy beauty: for he is thy Lord; and worship thou him.
verses.ct: Then the king will be captivated by your beauty. He is your lord — honor him.

verses.kjv: And the daughter of Tyre shall be there with a gift; even the rich among the people shall intreat thy favour.
verses.ct: The people of Tyre will come with gifts; the wealthy will seek your favor.

verses.kjv: The king’s daughter is all glorious within: her clothing is of wrought gold.
verses.ct: The royal bride is absolutely stunning within the palace; her gown is woven with gold.

verses.kjv: She shall be brought unto the king in raiment of needlework: the virgins her companions that follow her shall be brought unto thee.
verses.ct: She will be led to the king in embroidered clothing; the young women attending her, her bridesmaids, will be brought to you as well.

verses.kjv: With gladness and rejoicing shall they be brought: they shall enter into the king’s palace.
verses.ct: They will be escorted in with joy and celebration as they enter the king's palace.

verses.kjv: Instead of thy fathers shall be thy children, whom thou mayest make princes in all the earth.
verses.ct: Your sons will take the place of your ancestors; you will make them rulers throughout the earth.

verses.kjv: I will make thy name to be remembered in all generations: therefore shall the people praise thee for ever and ever.
verses.ct: I will ensure your name is remembered through every generation; that is why the nations will praise you forever and ever.
